client.control

Class DispatcherDetailsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.control.DispatcherDetailsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class DispatcherDetailsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    DispatcherDetailsController handles the logics of the Dispatcher screen. The class implements IController and Initializable interfaces.
    Author:
    shays

      void findClient(java.lang.String id)
      findClient function sends a FIND_CLIENT request to the server.

      Handle and process the reply instance that created by the server application.
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1) 
      void onCancelAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onCancelAppointmentButtonClick function handles the logics of cancel appointment button click The function creates a new CancelAppointmentUI instance and display the window on the screen.
      void onCreateAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onCreateAppointmentButtonClick function handles the logics of create appointment button click The function request an approved reference ID.
      void onCreateClientButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onCreateClientButtonClick function handles the logics of create client button click In case the requested client is not found in the DB the create client button is click-able The function creates a new CreateClientUI instance and display the window on the screen.
      void onFindClientIDButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onFindClientIDButtonClick function handles the logics of the search client button.
      void onLogoutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onLogoutButtonClick function is Logout button handler.
      void onRemoveClientButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onRemoveClientButtonClick function handles the logics of remove client button click The function calls removeClient function.
      void onRetrieveClientButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      onRetrieveClientButtonClick function handles the logics of retrieve client button click The function calls returnClient function.
      void removeClient(java.lang.String id)
      The function sends a request of Remove client to the server with the client's ID.
      void returnClient(java.lang.String id)
      The function creates a Return client request and sends the request with the client's ID to the server.
      private boolean validateID(java.lang.String id)
      validateID function checks if the entered ID of the client is valid.

      • onLogoutButtonClick

        public void onLogoutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        onLogoutButtonClick function is Logout button handler. Sends a logout request for the logged in user to the server.
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • validateID

        private boolean validateID(java.lang.String id)
        validateID function checks if the entered ID of the client is valid. An Israeli ID contains 9-digits.
        Parameters:
        id - Get the text from the ID TexField
        Returns:
        true if the validate success, false if the validation fails.
